options._help1_delete: This file allow you to permanently set options you use frequently.
options._help2_delete: You can suspend the settings in here using the option --no-config.
options._help3_delete: Only define options you use frequently. Any other options below should be deleted to
options._help4_delete: allow them being used from the command line (these help entries should be deleted as well)
options._help5_delete: The options below are the same as in the usage except the --no-* options which  are only * (use inverted boolean),
options._help6_delete: and in camel-type instead of dash (ie. '--no-colors' becomes 'colors', '--case-sensitive' becomes 'caseSensitive' etc.)
options._help7_delete: Remember to rename the file to mdncomp.json and place it in root folder of the mdncomp installation.
